## Functions

### emitConstantSizeRepmov() {#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SDValue emitConstantSizeRepmov (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp; DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp; Subtarget, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp; dl, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Src, uint64&#95;t Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, bool isVolatile, bool AlwaysInline, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> DstPtrInfo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> SrcPtrInfo)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a REP MOVS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement a constant size memory copy.

In some cases where we know REP MOVS is inefficient we return an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> so the calling code can either generate a load/store sequence or call the runtime memcpy function.

Definition at line <a href="#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86selectiondaginfo-cpp">X86SelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitConstantSizeRepstos() {#ac6a86b853c0a0262731e7e8b084c0980}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SDValue emitConstantSizeRepstos (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp; DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp; Subtarget, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp; dl, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Val, uint64&#95;t Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, bool isVolatile, bool AlwaysInline, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> DstPtrInfo)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a REP STOS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement a constant size memory set.

In some cases where we know REP MOVS is inefficient we return an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> so the calling code can either generate a store sequence or call the runtime memset function.

Definition at line <a href="#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86selectiondaginfo-cpp">X86SelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns a REP STOS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a constant size memory set. In some cases where we know REP MOVS is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In case we optimize for size, we use repstosb even if it&#39;s less efficient</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// so we can save the loads/stores of the leftover.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ac64ec73b0617befef1fb2eae78d12b5f">getMachineFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a548cfb9440f36ba67fc5566b8e967fc6">hasMinSize</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ValC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(Val)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Special case 0 because otherwise we get large literals,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which causes larger encoding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &amp; 31) == 0 &amp;&amp; (ValC-&gt;getZExtValue() &amp; 255) == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> BlockType = MVT::i32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t BlockBits = BlockType.getSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t BlockBytes = BlockBits / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t BlockCount = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> / BlockBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">        Val = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(0, dl, BlockType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// repstosd is same size as repstosb</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a5803624ca0eb040bd5fe421cef206737">emitRepstos</a>(Subtarget, DAG, dl, Chain, Dst, Val,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns a REP MOVS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a constant size memory copy. In some cases where we know REP MOVS is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inefficient we return an empty SDValue so the calling code can either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">/// generate a load/store sequence or call the runtime memcpy function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f">emitConstantSizeRepmov</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp;Subtarget, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;dl,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Src, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isVolatile, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AlwaysInline,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> DstPtrInfo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> SrcPtrInfo) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In case we optimize for size, we use repmovsb even if it&#39;s less efficient</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// so we can save the loads/stores of the leftover.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ac64ec73b0617befef1fb2eae78d12b5f">getMachineFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a548cfb9440f36ba67fc5566b8e967fc6">hasMinSize</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a59ef6118dc6f3e6af856cd61c1aca3c9">emitRepmovsB</a>(Subtarget, DAG, dl, Chain, Dst, Src, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// TODO: Revisit next line: big copy with ERMSB on march &gt;= haswell are very</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// efficient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!AlwaysInline &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget/#ad758ae414ac0d2976b79f246292e54a3">getMaxInlineSizeThreshold</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
